name: Residence Inn LAX El Segundo

reviews.text: This is by far the best Residence Inn I have stayed in. I travel quite a bit for work and I often travel with my dog and this is by far the best place to stay. If you are looking for an alternative to the standard hotel stay with the big crowded lobbies, noise, too many people and constantly waiting for the elevator then this is your place. It feels like you are in an apartment not a hotel room. The furnishings are very generic but very clean and comfy and the beds and bedding are very comfortable too. I love having my own coffee maker,refridge and microwave so I can do my own cooking if I choose. The only downside is the hotel is in an area that is mostly businesses so there is really nothing to walk to but the beach, some great beach towns and freeways are a short drive away. The positive side is its really quiet at night.
reviews.title: My favorite Residence Inn............Home away from home

likes.liked: — Big rooms, quiet grounds, cleanliness, pet friendly
likes.disliked: — I have stayed here 3 times and all have been good stays

reviews.text: we stayed here mid Sept for 3 nights after a flight from Hawaii. we are a family of 5, from Australia, and we stayed in their 2 bedroom 2 bath suite. The whole place was immaculate. Lovely pool, manicured gardens. The premises is located south of LAX , a short cab fare, in a business district, so night times were very quiet. It had easy access to main freeways.
reviews.title: lovely place

likes.liked: — location, cleaniness, friendliness of staff, free brekfast

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Hotel is very nice and clean, secured entrances, free parking and internet. Breakfast was very rich and tasty. The only minus I can state that you definitely need a car to tour around the city. There is no convenient transport available; metro is some 500m or little bit more away.
reviews.title: Nice hotel, good quality for money, bad location for tourists

likes.liked: — big rooms, free parking and internet

reviews.text: There is a reason why my 10year old insists that we stay in a Residence Inn when we travel.
reviews.title: Just like Home !

reviews.text: This RI is no exception. Rooms are accessible only from inside the building. Secure access to side entrances. Very clean. Very courteous. Rooms were very clean. Breakfast could have used a little more variety though. Ralph Grocery is a couple of miles away. Easy drive to major shopping. Convenient drive from the airport.
reviews.title: Clean, Friendly, Helpful.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: The glowing reviews are all true!

reviews.text: I stayed here with two others on a business trip. The hotel was great, it was spotless, the staff were ultra friendly and very very helpful. The rooms are massive, they seemed to be cleaned every day. The breakfast selection was a bit limited and the choice didint change much or maybe its just me being picky and trying to find a fault. As the hotel is a drive away from any restaurants the staff will act as a free taxi, by dropping you out and picking you up. I would strongly recommend travelling to Manhatten Beach and visit the `Rock n Fish` restaurant, it was brilliant, i`ve had alot of food in alot of places, this place would rate as one of the best, great for the seafood lover.
reviews.title: Great

aka: Residence Inn Lax El Segundo Hotel
